benefits.headline: Ensure content accessibility in restricted environments
benefits.description: The platform is designed with graceful degradation, allowing users to access core information even when JavaScript is disabled due to security policies, legacy browsers, or accessibility tools.
proof_points: Statement: 'JavaScript is not essential for this website'
benefits.business_impact: Broadens audience reach to include users in high-security environments or with limited technical resources.

benefits.headline: Unlock full interactive capabilities
benefits.description: By utilizing standard client-side scripting, users gain access to the complete, dynamic feature set of the platform, moving beyond static content to a fully immersive interface.
proof_points: Statement: 'Please turn JavaScript on for the full experience'
benefits.business_impact: Maximizes user engagement and usability through a responsive interface.

top_benefits: Ensure content accessibility in restricted environments

technical: Ensure content accessibility in restricted environments
end_user: Ensure content accessibility in restricted environments

use_cases.title: Static Content Access (Security/Legacy Mode)
use_cases.scenario: A user is accessing the website from a high-security environment where JavaScript is disabled, or via a text-based browser/screen reader on a legacy system.
use_cases.problem_solved: Users in restricted environments or with accessibility tools often cannot access modern websites that rely entirely on client-side rendering.
use_cases.solution_approach: The website is designed with progressive enhancement, ensuring that core content remains accessible even when JavaScript is turned off.

use_cases.title: Interactive Platform Exploration
use_cases.scenario: A developer or student visits the website to utilize dynamic tools (such as the interactive Python shell often hosted on the homepage) or navigate complex documentation menus.
use_cases.problem_solved: Static browsing limits the user's ability to engage with dynamic content, test code snippets, or navigate efficiently.
use_cases.solution_approach: The platform utilizes JavaScript to provide a 'full experience,' enabling dynamic interactions and advanced UI features.
